artist: Artist: Torii Kiyomasu ll; Publisher: Tsuruya Kiemon
catalogue_raissonne: Mutō, Shoki ukiyoe to kabuki (2005), no. 665
creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
medium: Woodblock print (urushi-e); ink on paper, with hand-applied color and nikawa
text: The actors Ichimura Uzaemon VIII (1698-1762) as Soga Jūrō 曽我十郎 and Segawa Kikunojō I (1693-1749) as the prostitute Takamado 傾城高間戸 in the play "Fuji miru sato sakae Soga" 富士見里栄曽我, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the first lunar month of 1742.
title: Actors Ichimura Uzaemon VIII as Soga Jūrō and Segawa Kikunojō I as the Prostitute Takamado
